remarks: The product of two numbers greater than 1 is greater than 1. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
ltp1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
divgt0d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
mulgt1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> 1 < A ) $.
mulgt1d.4 $e |- ( ph -> 1 < B ) $.
mulgt1d $p |- ( ph -> 1 < ( A x. B ) ) $.
